title: why the hell are my games freezing for a split second very often
body:
I have heard other people say they have this issue but I have not seen Rito looking to fix this problem

it has been like this for like 6 patches now

huge problem that likes to occur at the worst of times

replies.body:
Packet losses have abysmally gotten worse in recent months. It could be ISPs (I use Telstra) trying to compensate for something? Costs?
I don't really know myself.

I've ran into this problem before, turned out to be a problem with my ISP giving me crazy low upload speeds that day. Is there something in the background eating up your bandwidth? Could be part of the cause.

thanks for the advice

but my upload is 0.84Mbps which should be fine shouldn't it??

i've had this issue a bit too

has something to do with your upload speed though as @lemonhunter said
Three cheers for the average Australian internet speed! Hip hip!.... *10 minutes later*.... Hurray!
